LanguageData.AYHenbaneHigh.label: stoned on henbane
LanguageData.AYHenbaneHigh.description: Henbane's active chemical in the bloodstream. Generates pain relief.
LanguageData.AYHenbaneTolerance.label: henbane tolerance
LanguageData.AYHenbaneTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to henbane. The more severe this tolerance is, the more henbane it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.AYHenbaneAddiction.label: henbane dependence
LanguageData.AYHenbaneAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to henbane. Long-term use of henbane alkaloids has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of henbane, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.AYHenbaneAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
